00070     class SIM_API Node
00071     {
00072         friend class cTopology;
00073         friend class WeightedTopology;
00074 
00075       private:
00076         int module_id;
00077         double wgt;
00078         bool enabl;
00079 
00080         int num_in_links;
00081         Link **in_links;
00082         int num_out_links;
00083         Link *out_links;
00084 
00085         // variables used by the shortest-path algorithms
00086         bool known;
00087         double dist;
00088         Link *out_path;
00089 
00090       public:
00093 
00097         int getModuleId() const  {return module_id;}
00098 
00102         cModule *getModule() const  {return simulation.getModule(module_id);}
00103 
00108         double getWeight() const  {return wgt;}
00109 
00114         void setWeight(double d)  {wgt=d;}
00115 
00120         bool isEnabled() const  {return enabl;}
00121 
00126         void enable()  {enabl=true;}
00127 
00132         void disable()  {enabl=false;}
00134 
00137 
00141         int getNumInLinks() const  {return num_in_links;}
00142

00147 
00151         int getNumOutLinks() const  {return num_out_links;}
00152 
00156         LinkOut *getLinkOut(int i);
00158 
00161

00166 
00171         int getNumPaths() const  {return out_path?1:0;}

00239     class SIM_API LinkIn : public Link
00240     {
00241       public:
00249         Node *getRemoteNode() const  {return src_node;}
00250 
00254         int getRemoteGateId() const  {return src_gate;}
00255 
00259         int getLocalGateId() const  {return dest_gate;}
00260 
00264         cGate *getRemoteGate() const  {return src_node->getModule()->gate(src_gate);}
00265 
00269         cGate *getLocalGate() const  {return dest_node->getModule()->gate(dest_gate);}
00270     };

00281     class SIM_API LinkOut : public Link
00282     {
00283       public:
00291         Node *getRemoteNode() const  {return dest_node;}
00292 
00296         int getRemoteGateId() const  {return dest_gate;}
00297 
00301         int getLocalGateId() const  {return src_gate;}
00302 
00306         cGate *getRemoteGate() const  {return dest_node->getModule()->gate(dest_gate);}
00307 
00311         cGate *getLocalGate() const  {return src_node->getModule()->gate(src_gate);}
00312     };
